message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm looking to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do $100, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $85?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept. I can do $95, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I understand you're close to your minimum, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $88?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, and I'm starting to think it's time to consider other options. I can do $92, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $87?
I'm not getting any younger, and I'd rather not waste any more time on this negotiation. I'll meet you in the middle at $90, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $85?
